name: Dingjiang Liang
title: Software Engineer
about-text1: Born in Zhongshan, Guangdong, China, I am a passionate computer engineer with a degree in Computer Engineering from the University of California, Santa Cruz, specializing in full stack development and FPGA design. I am proficient in Python, Java, C, and C++, with extensive experience in cloud services such as AWS and Google Cloud. As a backend developer, I am keen on building efficient and scalable solutions that help businesses achieve technological transformation and optimize operations.
